name: **Lamb Islands**
description: Lamb Islands W216-311 Sheet 89 Fragme3nted group of islets off the headland 0.5km SE of Squince Harbour. Lovely architecture includes several arches and caves. Reputedly and authoritively there is here a stunning cave the author could not find. The summit of the largest islet is gorse and ling covered to test the hardiest bare legs. Land easiest perhaps in the E facing cut below the only apparent ascent onto sloping shelves. The climb is then possible, trust me.
